name: Soko Properties
description: Leading real estate agency specializing in urban and commercial properties.
fullDescription: Soko Properties offers comprehensive real estate services, including property sales, rentals, and management. With a focus on transparent dealings and client satisfaction, Soko Properties leverages a deep understanding of the Kenyan market to connect buyers with ideal homes and investors with lucrative opportunities. Their portfolio spans residential apartments, commercial offices, and prime land parcels.

ourTeam.name: Mwangi Kariuki
ourTeam.description: Visionary leader with over 15 years in real estate development and sales.

ourTeam.name: Aisha Hassan
ourTeam.description: Manages client relations and sales operations, driving market growth.

reviews.author: Investor, Nairobi
reviews.text: Soko Properties found us an excellent commercial plot, guiding us through every step.

reviews.author: Home Buyer
reviews.text: Professional, efficient, and incredibly helpful in finding my dream home.

name: Tech Solutions Ltd
description: Innovative IT solutions provider specializing in custom software development.
fullDescription: Tech Solutions Ltd delivers cutting-edge information technology services, including enterprise software, mobile application development, cloud computing solutions, and IT consulting. They help businesses streamline operations, enhance digital presence, and secure data infrastructure, serving clients across diverse sectors in East Africa.

ourTeam.name: Samuel Kipruto
ourTeam.description: Drives technological innovation and oversees all software development projects.

reviews.author: Startup CEO

reviews.author: Financial Institution
reviews.text: Their cloud solutions are secure and scalable. Excellent support.

name: Green Earth Eco Solutions
description: Provider of sustainable energy and waste management solutions.
fullDescription: Green Earth Eco Solutions is committed to fostering environmental sustainability through renewable energy installations (solar, wind), eco-friendly waste management, and environmental consulting. They empower businesses and households to reduce their carbon footprint and embrace greener practices, contributing to a healthier planet.
address: Magadi Road, Ongata Rongai, Kajiado County, Kenya

ourTeam.description: Advises clients on sustainable practices and environmental compliance.

ourTeam.name: John Muriithi

reviews.author: Factory Owner
reviews.text: Their solar installation significantly reduced our energy costs. Great service!

reviews.author: Homeowner
reviews.text: Professional and knowledgeable team. Helped us set up an efficient waste sorting system.

description: Full-service marketing agency specializing in digital campaigns and brand strategy.

name: Swift Ride Cabs
description: Reliable citywide taxi and corporate transfer service.
fullDescription: Swift Ride Cabs provides safe, efficient, and affordable transportation across Nairobi and the greater metropolitan area. ourTeam.name: Lilian Nduta
ourTeam.description: Ensures high service standards and coordinates feedback.

reviews.text: Punctual drivers, cashless payments, and very clean rides. My go-to transport company.

reviews.author: Corporate Client
reviews.text: Dependable for airport transfers with professional drivers.

name: Rapids Adventures
description: Thrilling whitewater rafting experiences on Kenyan rivers.
fullDescription: Rapids Adventures is Kenya’s premier whitewater rafting company, offering guided river expeditions, team-building packages, and adventure activities in Sagana and surrounding regions. With safety-certified guides and modern equipment, our excursions cater to thrill-seekers and nature lovers alike.
address: Riverfront Camp, Sagana, Kirinyaga County, Kenya

ourTeam.name: Ian Waweru

ourTeam.description: Coordinates bookings and ensures guest safety and satisfaction.

reviews.author: Corporate Outing Organiser
reviews.text: Our team building was a blast! Safety first, but fun all the way.
